snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrives in Istanbul on Saturday, and one topic on the table is the question of a safe haven for Syrian rebels near the Turkish border.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton will meet with Turkish officials on the Syrian conflict; one topic of discussion is the question of a safe haven for Syrian rebels near the Turkish border.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton arrives in Istanbul on Saturday, and one topic on the table is the question of a safe haven for Syrian rebels near the Turkish border.

headline.seo: Clinton to Discuss Syria Strategy in Turkey
headline.main: Strategy for Syrian Refugees in Turkey Is on Clinton Agenda
headline.print_headline: Strategy for Syrian Refugees in Turkey Is on Clinton Agenda
